about_the_game:
Welcome to "The Hamster" – an engaging and relaxing clicker game where your goal is to collect unique skins for your cute hamster. Earn points, unlock new skins, and enjoy the simple gameplay. This game is perfect for those looking for a straightforward and fun way to pass the time.

"The Hamster" is a game that will provide you with many pleasant moments. It doesn't require much time or special skills, but it can captivate you for a long time. Enjoy the light and relaxing atmosphere of the game anytime, anywhere.

Notes: The game requires minimal resources and is suitable for most modern PCs.
detailed_description:
Welcome to "The Hamster" – an engaging and relaxing clicker game where your goal is to collect unique skins for your cute hamster. Earn points, unlock new skins, and enjoy the simple gameplay. This game is perfect for those looking for a straightforward and fun way to pass the time.

"The Hamster" is a game that will provide you with many pleasant moments. It doesn't require much time or special skills, but it can captivate you for a long time. Enjoy the light and relaxing atmosphere of the game anytime, anywhere.

Notes: The game requires minimal resources and is suitable for most modern PCs.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU or Apple M1 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: macOS compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU or Apple M1 GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: macOS compatible

name: The Hamster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: The game requires minimal resources and is suitable for most modern PCs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: The game requires minimal resources and is suitable for most modern PCs.

short_description: Welcome to "The Hamster" – a fun and relaxing clicker game where you collect unique skins for your adorable hamster. Earn points, unlock new skins, and enjoy the simple yet captivating gameplay. Perfect for those looking for a light and enjoyable gaming experience.
